body.p: When the PC is powered off, you can press the Novo button to display the Novo button menu. From the menu, you can then choose to:

ul.li: Display the boot device selection menu
Display the Windows advanced startup options page

body.note: The Novo button is rarely used during normal PC operations. To prevent users from accidentally pressing it, the Novo button is placed in a recessed hole. You can use a straightened paper clip to press this button.
